fields.name: Gem Battle
fields.value: Each day, a player can do up to 10 additional arena battles with gems. The gem cost is 10 / 10 / 10 / 20 / 20 / 30 / 30 / 40 / 40 / 50 (total **260 gems**).

fields.name: Time Limit
fields.value:
• Each battle has a time limit of 2 minutes and 30 seconds.
• After 2 minutes of fighting, Grim Reaper will come to the battlefield, and all units will lose 10% of their maximum life every second (Grim Reaper will ignore any damage immunity).
• If a battle reaches the time limit, the defender automatically wins.

fields.name: Network Error / Game Crashing
fields.value: • If a battle fails to finish due to network error or game crashing, the server will determine that the defender wins the battle after 5 minute. This mechanism was implemented to address a common past abuse where players would intentionally quit battles to avoid losses.
